participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Creative and nurturing, Emily is passionate about art and animals.
participant_1.background: I decided to turn my life around and focus on my passions. I own a ford truck. I have two pet dogs. My family is really busy and we don't always have time to connect. Last year, I painted a portrait of my two small dogs.

participant_2.name: Josh
participant_2.personality: Outgoing and fun-loving, Josh enjoys sports and socializing with friends.
participant_2.background: I play basketball with my friends and enjoy going to concerts. I live at home with my dad and brother. I had a gig at local theater last night. I'm originally from London, England. I'm a great cook, and my friends would love to try my recipes.

content.text: It's going well! I'm just hanging out, painting a portrait of my dogs.
Oh, that's really cool! What kind of dogs do you have?
I have two little yorkies. They're the sweetest dogs ever.
Aww, that's so cute! I've always wanted a dog, but I'm not sure if I'm ready for the responsibility yet.
It's a lot of work, but it's so worth it. They're the best companions you could ask for.
I bet! I love animals. I'm originally from London, England, and I used to love going to the zoo there.
Oh, that's so cool! I've always wanted to go to London.
You should definitely go! It's an amazing city.
I definitely will! Thanks for the suggestion.
No problem! So, what else do you like to do?
I love to play basketball with my friends and go to concerts.
Oh, that's awesome! I love basketball too.
